Purba Medinipur Sea BeachJoin our travel community for the latest tips, guides, and exclusive offers!Subscribe You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!If you’re planning for a break from the busy city life of Kolkata, a beach getaway is the perfect remedy. Luckily, Kolkata is surrounded by several beautiful beaches that offer peaceful landscapes, exciting activities, and a chance to rejuvenate. Kolkata, one of the rain-soaked wonders of West Bengal, is also the cultural capital of India. Whether you’re looking for a quick weekend escape or a family-friendly destination, this list of top beaches near Kolkata will guide you to your ideal seaside retreat.1. DighaAmong famous Beaches in Kolkata, Digha is Located just 183 km from Kolkata, Digha is one of the most popular beach destinations. Known for its long sandy shores and gentle waves, it’s ideal for a relaxing day by the sea. Don’t miss out on the local seafood, and take a stroll along the Digha Beach promenade for a beautiful sunset view. This is one of the favourite destinations near Kolkata for weekends by the local bengalis. Ideal Time to Visit: October to MarchLocation: Digha Medinipur 2. MandarmaniAround 170 km from Kolkata, Mandarmani is a quieter alternative to Digha. It boasts a 13 km long coastline, making it perfect for long walks and beach activities. The less crowded beaches here offer a more tranquil experience, and the beach is known for its red crabs and scenic beauty.Ideal Time to Visit: October to MarchLocation: Mandarmani, West Bengal3. ShankarpurAmong famous Beaches in Kolkata, Shankarpur is approximately 160 km from Kolkata, Shankarpur is a small and peaceful beach destination. It’s famous for its tranquil atmosphere and clean beaches. You need to consider all the tips regarding  Kolkata seaside trips, before visiting this beach. The fishing village charm adds to the experience, making it a unique getaway from the usual tourist spots. Are you looking for the Best beaches near Kolkata, then, it is the perfect place. If you are planning for Weekend beach getaways from Kolkata, this can be the one for you. Ideal Time to Visit: October to MarchLocation: JHQJ+778, Digha, Jamra Shyampur, West Bengal 721423Also Read: 12 Best Places for Shopping in Kolkata: A Complete Guide4. TajpurAre you looking for the Top beaches around Kolkata with friends, Tajpur is the one. Located about 180 km from Kolkata, Tajpur is a hidden gem with its pristine and less commercialized beach. It’s an excellent spot for nature lovers and those looking to escape the crowds. The mangrove forests and the picturesque beach create a perfect backdrop for relaxation.Ideal Time to Visit: November to MarchLocation: Bay Tower, Bay Tower, Hiland Park, Eastern Metropolitan Bypass, Tajpur, 1925, Chak Garia, Santoshpur, Tajpur, Bera Khana, West Bengal 7000945. Henry’s IslandThis is among famous Kolkata beach destinations, but a bit further away around 130 km from Kolkata, Henry’s Island offers a unique blend of beaches and riverine beauty. Surrounded by lush greenery and peaceful waters, it’s an ideal spot for picnics and nature walks. The nearby lighthouse provides an added attraction with panoramic views of the coastline. Are you looking for the Best beaches near Kolkata, then, it is the perfect place. Also,  If you are planning for Weekend beach getaways from Kolkata, this can be the one for you.Ideal Time to Visit: November to FebruaryLocation: Sundari Tourist Complex, Henry’s Island, Near Bakkhali, Bakkhali, Henry Island, West Bengal 743370Also Read: 28 Best Places To Eat In Kolkata | Local Recommendations6. JunputBeing one of the Top beaches around Kolkata, Junput is located around 140 km from Kolkata, Junput is a less frequented beach that’s perfect for a quiet retreat. It’s known for its wide and clean sandy shores and is ideal for a peaceful day out. The local fishing activities provide an authentic coastal experience.  Moreover, If you are planning for Weekend beach getaways from Kolkata, this can be the one for you.Ideal Time to Visit: October to MarchLocation: Junput Market,, Contai, West Bengal7. BakkhaliBeing among the famous Kolkata beach destinations, Bakkhali is around 150 km from Kolkata, Bakkhali is a relatively lesser-known destination with a beautiful, peaceful beach. It’s perfect for those who enjoy solitude and the simple pleasures of beach life. The area is also known for its proximity to the nearby wildlife sanctuary, offering a unique combination of beach and nature. If you miss visiting this, the Kolkata beach visit guide is incomplete. Ideal Time to Visit: October to FebruaryLocation: West Bengal 743339Also Read: 14 Best Restaurants in Kolkata: A Culinary Delight8. Sagar IslandSituated about 100 km from Kolkata, Sagar Island is a bit further but worth the trip. It’s renowned for its religious significance and scenic beauty. The island offers a mix of beachside relaxation and cultural experiences, with the annual Gangasagar Mela being a notable event. Every year, this festival attracts a lot of people from different areas and religions.  Ideal Time to Visit: December to FebruaryLocation: Dipak Rd, Gangasagar, West Bengal 7433739. FrazerganjApproximately 130 km from Kolkata, Frazerganj is another peaceful destination known for its clean and peaceful beach. It’s a great spot for those who prefer a less commercialized environment and enjoy observing local fishing activities.  If you are planning for Weekend beach getaways from Kolkata, this can be the one for you.Ideal Time to Visit: October to MarchLocation: South 24 Parganas Frezerganj, Bakkhali, West Bengal 743357Suggested Read: Pristine Beaches Near Bangalore For The Perfect Weekend Escapade10. Purba Medinipur Sea BeachBeing one of the famous Kolkata beach destinations, Medinipur is around 150 km from Kolkata, Purba Medinipur offers a beautiful coastline with less touristy crowds. Are you looking for the Best beaches near Kolkata, then, it is the perfect place. You can say, It is an ideal place to enjoy a day at the beach, with ample opportunities for beach games and relaxing. If you miss visiting this, the Kolkata beach visit guide is incomplete. Ideal Time to Visit: November to MarchLocation: Medinipur, West Bengal With so many stunning beaches near Kolkata, you’re sure to find a perfect spot for your next weekend getaway.
